Title: Caras Ute
Creator: Poley, H. S. (Horace Swartley)
Summary: Studio portrait (sitting) of a Native American (Ute) woman, Caras. She wears a high collar dress and a brooch.
Description: 1 photonegative : glass ; 18 x 13 cm. (7 x 5 in.)
Is Part Of: C Photo Collection 37. H. S. Poley collection.
Type of Material: Glass negatives.; Portrait photographs.; Imaged.; Image
Subject: Indians of North America--1890-1920.; Ute Indians--Women--1890-1920.; Caras.
